Name: Idle 1
CvContent: Celica: No motivations? How about when you finish your work,\nI give you a <color=#34AFF8>little present</color>?

Name: Greeting upon Login
CvContent: Celica: I've already had today's work arranged for you!\nA 9.5-page paperwork. Should be a breeze to you!

Name: Reward Reminder
CvContent: Celica: You have <color=#34AFF8>rewards</color> that can be claimed.\nI'm gonna charge you overtime fees if you need me to claim them for you.

Name: Single Tap
CvContent: Celica: Ha! Phew... It's you.\nI was thinking about moving a mission to tomorrow since you are busy.\nBut I've changed my mind right now.

Name: Quick Tap
CvContent: Celica: Don't even think about getting home on time today...

Name: Reminder that it is locked
CvContent: Celica: No, you have to <color=#34AFF8>complete previous</color> missions\nbefore unlocking the missions here.\nHurry only makes worry!

Name: Completed Mission Rewards
CvContent: Celica: You've really impressed me by completing all the missions in such a short time!\nI expect you can be even faster, right?\nCan't wait to see it!

Name: Idle 3
CvContent: Celica: The <color=#34AFF8>Progress Rewards</color> below are quite <color=#34AFF8>valuable</color>. \nJust so you know I'm not a complete demon!

Name: Idle 2
CvContent: Celica: Wanna know the gossip about President Hassen and Commander Nikola?\nBack? What's behind my...
